降給: (こうきゅう) - (ant: 昇給) reduction in pay
降誕祭: (こうたんさい) - Christmas/Nativity; celebration of the birthday of a saint or great man

降魔術: (こうまじゅつ) - demon invocation; summoning demons
限り: (kagiri) - limite, limites, fronteiras; grau, extensão, alcance; limite, limites, fronteiras; grau, extensão, alcance; tanto quanto possível, ao máximo, da melhor forma possível, muito; a menos que
限り無し: (きりなし) - (usu. used adverbially as 限り無しに) boundlessness/endlessness/infinity; incessantness/continuousness
限る: (かぎる) - to restrict/to limit/to confine; to be restricted to/to be limited to/to be confined to

限外顕微鏡: (げんがいけんびきょう) - ultramicroscope
限定保証: (げんていほしょう) - limited warranties
限定出版: (げんていしゅっぱん) - limited publication
限定形容詞: (げんていけいようし) - attributive adjective
限定戦争: (げんていせんそう) - limited war
限定的: (げんていてき) - limited; limiting; restrictive

限局性腸炎: (げんきょくせいちょうえん) - {med}  regional enteritis

限月: (きりげつ) - contract month; delivery month (of a futures contract)
限無し: (きりなし) - (usu. used adverbially as 限り無しに) boundlessness/endlessness/infinity; incessantness/continuousness

限界顕微鏡: (げんかいけんびきょう) - high magnification microscope
限目: (げんめ) - ~th period (e.g. ~th class in school day); period of time
陛下: (heika) - Sua Majestade, Sua Majestade, Sua Majestade
陞る: (のぼる) - to ascend/to go up/to climb; (usu. 昇る) to ascend (as a natural process, e.g. the sun)/to rise; to go to (the capital); to be promoted; to add up to; to advance (in price); to swim up (a river)/to sail up; to come up (on the agenda)
